title: Modern Kitchen Revival
description: A complete kitchen transformation with custom cabinetry, warm lighting, and premium finishes — blending modern design with Houston's charm.
longDescription: This River Oaks kitchen transformation seamlessly merges modern functionality with classic sophistication. Custom cabinetry, premium marble countertops, and state-of-the-art appliances create a chef's dream while maintaining the home's elegant character.

title: Contemporary Living Elegance
description: An open-concept living area designed for both entertaining and relaxation.
longDescription: This Memorial home's living space embodies effortless elegance. Neutral tones, luxurious textures, and carefully curated furnishings create an inviting atmosphere perfect for both intimate gatherings and grand celebrations.

title: Luxe Bedroom Suite
description: A tranquil retreat designed for rest and rejuvenation.
longDescription: This Heights master suite is a study in understated luxury. Soft color palettes, premium linens, and custom built-ins create a personal sanctuary that promotes rest and relaxation while reflecting the homeowners' refined taste.

title: Spa-Inspired Bathroom
description: A luxurious bathroom retreat with premium finishes.
longDescription: Transform your daily routine in this spa-inspired West University bathroom. Italian marble, custom vanities, and high-end fixtures create a hotel-worthy experience at home, while maximizing functionality for busy mornings.

title: Urban Café Redesign
description: A professional workspace that reflects brand identity.
longDescription: This downtown café balances professionalism with creative energy. Custom millwork, strategic lighting, and thoughtful space planning create an environment that inspires productivity while making a memorable impression on clients.

title: Contemporary Family Kitchen
description: A functional yet beautiful space for family gatherings.
longDescription: This Bellaire kitchen redesign prioritizes both aesthetics and functionality for a growing family. Ample storage, durable surfaces, and an open layout create a space where cooking, homework, and family time seamlessly coexist.

title: The Oakwood Residence
description: Complete luxury home transformation with elegant finishes throughout.
longDescription: A comprehensive renovation of this Sugar Land estate, transforming every room with sophisticated design choices, premium materials, and attention to detail that reflects the homeowners' refined lifestyle.

title: Elegant Dining Experience
description: A sophisticated dining space perfect for entertaining.
longDescription: This dining room redesign creates the perfect backdrop for memorable gatherings. Custom lighting, rich textures, and carefully selected furnishings elevate everyday meals into special occasions.

title: Complete Bathroom Renovation
description: A full bathroom transformation with spa-like amenities.
longDescription: This complete bathroom renovation brings resort-style luxury home. Premium fixtures, heated floors, and custom tilework create a daily spa experience.
